title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 1725 - General Administration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 1725 - General Administration

State Regulations

Subpart 1725-1 - Basic References (§ 1725-1.1 to 1725-1.6)

Subpart 1725-2 - Responsibilities Of Board Of Directors (§ 1725-2.1 to 1725-2.5)

Subpart 1725-3 - Housing Company Meetings (§ 1725-3.1 to 1725-3.5)

Subpart 1725-4 - Repealed

Subpart 1725-5 - Files (§ 1725-5.1 to 1725-5.3)

Subpart 1725-6 - Identity Of Interest And Unauthorized Payments (§ 1725-6.1 to 1725-6.2)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 1725

Statutory authority: Private Housing Law, §§
14, 19; Private Housing Finance Law, §§ 32, 32-a[6], 84

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
